title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.278 - Record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.278 - Record

State Regulations
A book or document containing or evidencing some or all
of the activities of a hospital or containing or supporting a transaction, entry or account. Examples: a book of account; subsidiary ledger; invoice; voucher; contract; correspondence; internal report; minute
book. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.278

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
